description:
You are in the Dashboard.
Login via [bookingflix.com/en/sign-in.html](https://bookingflix.com/en/sign-in.html)

1. Click on ***Share***.
2. Click on ***Share appointment calendar***.
3. Click on ***Recreate organization***.
4. Assign a name for the shared calendar.
5. Select the booking calendar to be shared. Multiple selection is possible.
6. Click on the button ***Save organization now***.
7. Click on the ***Settings*** button.
8. Click on the button ***Share this organization***.
9. Select the user who is allowed to access the selected calendar. This user must have been previously registered via Bookingflix. To do this, create a free account at: https://bookingflix.en/quickstart.
10. Select the rights that the previously selected user should have.
11. Click on the button ***save now***.
12. The selected user can now take on the assigned role via the link ***Select/Deselect organization***. He then only has the rights that were granted to him in step 10. 

Please also note the webinar video on this at: https://bookingflix.en/support/webinar
title: Hand over calendar management to third parties or employees
